amendment.description: To repeal section 105 of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2004.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2934 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2934 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S3115-3116; text: CR S3115) To repeal section 105 of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2004.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2934 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2934 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Collins.
